mapper.sql: ID, SUPPLIER_ID, SUPPLIER_NAME, MONEY, PAY_MONEY, CONTRACT_NAME, CONTRACT_NO, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_NAME, SIGN_DATE sign, DELETE_FLAG, REV1, REV2, REV3, REMARK
mapper.select:
select , (select s.NAME from SUPPLIER s where s.ID = SUPPLIER_ID) supplierName from FINANCE_PURCHASE_CONTRACT where 1 = 1 and DELETE_FLAG='0'
and CONTRACTNO like '%${contractNo}%'
and CONTRACTNAME like '%${ContractName}%'
order by CREATE_DATE desc

select ID, SUPPLIER_ID, SUPPLIER_NAME, MONEY, PAY_MONEY, CONTRACT_NAME, CONTRACT_NO, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_NAME, SIGN_DATE sign, DELETE_FLAG, REV1, REV2, REV3, REMARK from FINANCE_PURCHASE_CONTRACT where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into FINANCE_PURCHASE_CONTRACT (ID, SUPPLIER_ID, SUPPLIER_NAME, MONEY, PAY_MONEY, CONTRACT_NAME, CONTRACT_NO, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_NAME, SIGN_DATE, DELETE_FLAG, REV1, REV2, REV3, REMARK) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createName,jdbcType=DATE}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{modifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sign,jdbcType=DATE}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rev1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rev2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rev3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into FINANCE_PURCHASE_CONTRACT
ID,
SUPPLIER_ID,
SUPPLIER_NAME,
MONEY,
PAY_MONEY,
CONTRACT_NAME,
CONTRACT_NO,
CREATE_DATE,
CREATE_NAME,
MODIFY_DATE,
MODIFY_NAME,
SIGN_DATE,
DELETE_FLAG,
REV1,
REV2,
REV3,
REMARK,

mapper.update:
update FINANCE_PURCHASE_CONTRACT
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_NAME = #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MONEY = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAY_MONEY = #{payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONTRACT_NAME = #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CREATE_NAME = #{createName,jdbcType=DATE},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=DATE},
MODIFY_NAME = #{modifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGN_DATE = #{sign,jdbcType=DATE},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REV1 = #{rev1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REV2 = #{rev2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REV3 = #{rev3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update FINANCE_PURCHASE_CONTRACT set SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIER_NAME = #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONEY = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAY_MONEY = #{payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTRACT_NAME = #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CREATE_NAME = #{createName,jdbcType=DATE}, MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=DATE}, MODIFY_NAME = #{modifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGN_DATE = #{sign,jdbcType=DATE}, DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REV1 = #{rev1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REV2 = #{rev2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REV3 = #{rev3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
